sentences.sCn: 是什么造就了一名纵火犯？

sentences.sContent: The next day, the arsonist was arrested at a gymnasium.
sentences.sContent_eng: The next day, the arsonist was arrested at a gymnasium.
sentences.sCn: 第二天，纵火犯在一家体育馆被逮捕了。

sentences.sContent: We should not pay an arsonist to put out his own fire, and we should not be paying an executive to ruin his own bank.
sentences.sContent_eng: We should not pay an arsonist to put out his own fire, and we should not be paying an executive to ruin his own bank.
sentences.sCn: 我们不应该付钱给纵火者去扑灭自己放的火,我们也不该付钱给搞垮自家银行的高管.

trans.tranOther: someone who commits the crime of arson
